list.name: Releases
list.rawQuery: select extract(epoch from time) AS time, title as text, description as tags from sannotations where $__timeFilter(time)
list.query: SELECT title, description from annotations WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "Stargazers"
from
  swatchers
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'watch[[repo]]watch'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Forks"
from
  swatchers
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'watch[[repo]]forks'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Open issues and PRs"
from
  swatchers
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'watch[[repo]]opiss'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Number of contributing companies"
from
  snum_stats
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'nstats[[repogroup]]comps'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Number of contributing developers"
from
  snum_stats
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'nstats[[repogroup]]devs'
order by
  time

panels.description: Number of PRs merged in given repository group
panels.title: PRs merged per repository groups ([[repogroups]], [[period]])

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  ${repogroups:csv}
from
  sgrp_pr_merg
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  "value" as "All PRs merged"
from
  sall_prs_merged
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

panels.description: Show Issues opened/closed for given repository group

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  "[[repogroup]]" as "Issues opened"
from
  siopened
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  "[[repogroup]]" as "Issues closed"
from
  siclosed
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

panels.title: Issues Repository group: [[repogroup_name]] ([[period]])

seriesOverrides.alias: 15th percentile time opened to merged (in hours)

panels.description: Time before any comments or activities from someone other than the author
panels.title: Time before any comments or activities from someone other than the author (Repository group: [[repogroup_name]], [[period]])

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "85th percentile time"
from
  sfirst_non_author
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'non_auth[[repogroup]]p85'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Median time"
from
  sfirst_non_author
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'non_auth[[repogroup]]med'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "15th percentile time"
from
  sfirst_non_author
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'non_auth[[repogroup]]p15'
order by
  time

panels.title: Time to first non-author activity (Repository group: [[repogroup_name]], [[period]])

targets.rawSql:
select
  time as "Time",
  descr as "15th percentile"
from
  sfirst_non_author
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'non_auth[[repogroup]]p15'
order by
  time

select
  time as "Time",
  descr as "Median"
from
  sfirst_non_author
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'non_auth[[repogroup]]med'
order by
  time

select
  time as "Time",
  descr as "85th percentile"
from
  sfirst_non_author
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'non_auth[[repogroup]]p85'
order by
  time

panels.description: Current median closing time for recent issues.
panels.title: Current median time to close for issues created last [[period]] for repository group [[repogroup_name]]

targets.rawSql:
select
  descr
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]allm'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.description: Number of closed issues opened recently.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time, value
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]alln'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.title: Number of closed issues opened last [[period]] for repository group [[repogroup_name]]

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "Average number of issues opened"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]alln'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Median time to close issue"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]allm'
order by
  time

panels.title: Number/Median time to close of Issues in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])
panels.description: Median time to close and number of issues created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

panels.title: Number/Median time to close of Issues in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])
panels.description: Median time to close and the numberâ€‹ of issues created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time as "Time",
  descr as "Median time to close issue"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]allm'
order by
  time

select
  time as "Time",
  value as "Average number of issues opened"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]alln'
order by
  time

list.name: full_name
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'full_name'

list.label: Repository
list.query: select top_repo_names_name from ttop_repo_names order by 1
list.name: repo_name

list.query: select top_repo_names_value from ttop_repo_names where top_repo_names_name = '[[repo_name]]'
list.name: repo
repogroup_name
list.label: Repository group
list.query: select all_repo_group_name from tall_repo_groups order by 1

list.name: repogroup
list.query: select all_repo_group_value from tall_repo_groups where all_repo_group_name = '[[repogroup_name]]'

list.label: Repository groups
list.name: repogroups
list.query: select '"' || repo_group_name || '"' from trepo_groups order by 1
